message.body: Here
Hey. How has hour and half been?
Fine! ￼Not happy but not crying haha
More resigned to the situation at hand
How long did he cry for?
Far less time that last time, maybe a minute
Then just general frustration lol
Last time he cried for at least thirty min straight
He is fine now. A little grumpy but fine. He is pushing his toy and entertaining himself and has resigned himself to the horror that is the babysitter Hahahahaha
I swear I'm Not that bad Kyle!
Haha. Ok I'm glad it's better than last time!
Are you playing with him or he is entertaining himself?
I played in the beginning but he seems happier playing alone honestly. I'm right here tho on couch watching him. He is playing w the plastic toys and wooden push toy
He cried more when I played w him tbh
When I stopped he was like 'thank goodness, let me be grumpy in peace w my toys" '
Aww!!
I agree!
Lol he is super cute
His grumpy face is Adorbz
He does it more when I'm trying to play w him and he's like ugh you are NOt my mommy and don't even try
Lololol that's when the grumpy face and half cry start and I'm like wooooah ok leaving you w the push cart in peace little cutie pie
I'm just sitting on couch watching him and texting w you/reading
On which floor? There's a push cart on each
Upstairs
Is he getting tired?
I'm going to give him more time bc he's pushing the cart and playing w the plastic toys and arranging them /carrying them
Maybe he is getting a little tired, but mainly he seems ok and in his own world
Ok good!
He really didn't cry much- just for a minute and then on/off if I annoyed him
Haha
Lol he is fine. He was far more upset last time
He is growing up! Learning that life is *hard* and babysitters are the devil
Lololol ❤️❤️❤️☺️
On our way!
Great. Kyle fell asleep on the floor like a little peanut
What time?
